summary: Successfully completed Phase 1 of the cascais-fishing production WASM fix plan. Installed required PostgreSQL dependencies (pg@8.16.3, @types/pg@8.15.5), fixed Prisma Client configuration by removing incompatible datasources section from PrismaClient constructor, verified clean local build with successful compilation, and tested API connectivity confirming database connection works properly. Critical WASM dependency issue has been resolved and local development environment is fully functional.
current_status: Phase 1 complete - ready to proceed to Phase 2 (Vercel environment configuration) for production deployment. All local tests passing, no WASM errors, API endpoints returning valid data. Production deployment preparation is the next critical step.
